text: ara muham'mada ekajana rasula bai to nana. Nihsandeha tamra purbe rasulagana gata haye gechena. Ata'eba tini yadi mara yana athaba tamke katala kara haya tahale ki tomara tomadera goralira upare mora pherabe? Ara ye ke'u tara goralira upare mora phere se kintu, ara allah acire'i puraskara debena krtajnadera.
